purpose: To provide a comprehensive dataset and benchmarks for research in car aerodynamics using deep learning and CFD simulations.
principle: Combines large-scale multimodal datasets with computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations and deep learning models for predictive analysis in car design.
reusability: Open-source dataset and codebase can be used for developing and benchmarking new models in aerodynamics and car design research.
limitations: Primarily focused on car design, may not generalize well to other domains; requires significant computational resources for CFD simulations.
name: DrivAerNet
description: A Large-Scale Multimodal Car Dataset with Computational Fluid Dynamics Simulations and Deep Learning Benchmarks
highlight: Unique integration of computational fluid dynamics simulations with deep learning for car design analysis.
